resources.string: List of official devices and their maintainers
Show your support to Zenx-OS Team
Jump to camera, swipe to screenshot
Tile layout, header image, background blur
Vibrate when fingerprint authentication is successful
Show additional battery info while charging
Setup Clock, Battery and network info
Configure the visibility of icons in the status bar
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
This will hide all force close notificaitons
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Wake up the device when the charger is plugged or unplugged
Long press power button while the screen is off to turn on the flashlight
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap on the lockscreen to put the device to sleep
Show or hide system info icon in qs header
Turn off some pixels to reduce power consumption
Auto enable with battery saver to increase power savings
Prevent burn-in by shifting pixels every
Enable to show battery percent while dozing
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
Network mode will be switched to 3G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on
Display 4G icon in status bar instead of LTE

Display the tile settings icon in the QS footer

Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy

Restart the apps in order for the changes to take effect

Show lights for all doze events and not just notifications
